name: Beat Saber
description: Swing your virtual lightsabers to the beat of adrenaline-pumping music in this action-packed VR rhythm game.

name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition
description: Learn to play guitar or bass with this game that offers a comprehensive program of interactive lessons and dynamic jam tracks.

name: Audiosurf 2
description: Ride your music in this unique game that generates tracks based on your songs and lets you race, puzzle, or chill.

name: Crypt of the NecroDancer
description: Move to the beat in this roguelike dungeon crawler that combines rhythm-based gameplay and randomly generated levels.

name: Melody's Escape
description: Run, jump, and slide to the rhythm of your own music library in this indie platformer with a unique twist.

name: Thumper
description: Enter a hellish world of rhythm violence in this intense rhythm game that blends classic gameplay with new twists.

name: Guitar Hero Live
description: Rock out to a new generation of music in this revamp of the classic music franchise, featuring a live-action audience and real musicians.

name: OSU!
description: Test your reflexes and accuracy in this free and open-source rhythm game that lets you create and share your own beatmaps.

name: Symphony
description: Blast your way through waves of enemies with your own music library in this arcade-style shooter with a musical twist.

name: Musiverse
description: Pilot your spaceship through a musical galaxy in this casual game that lets you play with your favorite tunes.
